about.name: Anastasios Tilsizoglou
about.title: Senior Software Engineer in Test
about.description: I am a dedicated Quality Assurance Automation Engineer with a strong passion for cybersecurity. My foundation in software and web development is complemented by extensive expertise in diverse automation tools and frameworks, alongside proficiency in multiple programming languages. I thrive on continuous learning and actively seek new challenges. Valued for my organizational skills, strategic mindset, and collaborative nature, I aim to elevate software quality through robust QA practices. I hold a Master's degree in Applied Informatics, specializing in Software Quality Assurance Engineering, and am a certified tester by the ISTQB Organization.
